name: pushpin
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small pin with a small ball-shaped piece of plastic on one end, used especially for putting notices, pictures, etc. on a board or a wall Compare
drawing pin UK
thumbtack USSee also
pin noun (PIECE OF METAL)
